title.narrative: Rädda Barnen – Social sammanhållning, fredsbyggande och motståndskraft 2021–2024
Save the Children - Social Cohesion, Peace Building and Resiliency 2021-2024

description.narrative: Insatsen ämnar förbrättra lokala samhällen sociala sammanhållning, välmående och förmåga att återintegrera utsatta pojkar och flickor som riskerar att associeras eller som har anknytning till väpnade grupper genom tillhandahållandet av sociala skyddsnät, utbildning, försörjning samt civil-militär koordinering.

The intervention aims to improve the social cohesion, well-being and capacity of local communities to reintegrate vulnerable boys and girls at risk of association or associated with armed groups through the provision of social protection, education, livelihoods and civil-military coordination.

The overall objective of the program is to improve community level social cohesion, well-being and reintegration of vulnerable boys and girls at risk or associated with armed groups through integrated gender responsive, disability inclusive child protection, livelihood (CVA) and education services.
The proposed program will achieve the following four key results:
Result 1. Vulnerable boys and girls affected by conflict and insecurity improve their safety and well-being through better, more equitable and inclusive access to comprehensive and conflict-sensitive child protection services
Result 2. Vulnerable IDP and host community households are resilient and meet their basic needs through improved access to economic, food, life skills and community capacity building opportunities
Result 3. Children (girls and boys) from communities affected by the security crisis have access to inclusive quality education in a safe and protective environment through capacity building in emergency education and psychological first aid
Result 4. Community cohesion, child protection practice, and civil-military coordination is increased in order to facilitate programmes and protection of children and civilians affected by armed conflict

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution

tag.narrative: 16.1 - Avsevärt minska alla former av våld och dödligt våld överallt.
16.1 - Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere.
2.1 - By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

2.1 - Senast 2030 avskaffa hunger och garantera alla människor, i synnerhet de fattiga och människor i utsatta situationer, inklusive små barn, tillgång till tillräckligt med säker och näringsrik mat året om.
4.1 - By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys complete free, equitable and quality primary and secondary education leading to relevant and effective learning outcomes.
4.1 - Senast 2030 säkerställa att alla flickor och pojkar fullbordar avgiftsfri och likvärdig grundskole- och gymnasieutbildning av god kvalitet som leder till relevanta och ändamålsenliga kunskaper.
5.1 - Avskaffa alla former av diskriminering av alla kvinnor och flickor överallt
5.1 - End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere.
